{{cpp/ranges/drop_view/title|end}}
{{cpp/ranges/drop_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1=
constexpr auto end() requires (!/*simple-view*/&lt;V&gt;);
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|1=
constexpr auto end() const requires ranges::range&lt;const V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a sentinel or an iterator representing the end of the {{tt|drop_view}}.

Effectively returns {{c|ranges::end(base_)}}, where {{rlpi|/#Data members|base_}} is the underlying view.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A sentinel or an iterator representing the end of the view.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;algorithm&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;iterator&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    namespace ranges = std::ranges;
    constexpr char url[]{"https://cppreference.com"};
    
    const auto p = std::distance(ranges::begin(url), ranges::find(url, '/'));
    auto site = ranges::drop_view{url, p + 2}; // drop the prefix "https://"
 
    for (auto it = site.begin(); it != site.end(); ++it)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; *it;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
cppreference.com
}}
